name: Generative AI | AP News
snippet: Microsoft announced an artificial intelligence partnership Monday with the French startup Mistral AI that could lessen the software giant’s reliance on ChatGPT-maker OpenAI for supplying the next wave of chatbots and other generative AI products. Updated 11:53 AM PST, February 26, 2024.
